Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

DDK XMIDI Function: RAD_wait

Discussion

Input:

AX = Number of intervals to delay

Output:

Nothing
All registers preserved

Purpose:

System- and CPU-independent delay: waits approximately 16 millisecond per interval


Group: DDK Support Routines for XMIDI Sound Drivers
